entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
